<% for(const occurrence of occurrences) { %> <div class="occurrence <%= ocurrence.type %>">
<%= ocurrence.formattedDate %> <% if(ocurrence.type === "start") { %> <%= localization.recurrenceStart %> <% } %> <% if(ocurrence.type === "rdate") { %> <%= >localization.additionalDate %> <% } %>
<% if(!readOnly) { %>
<% if(ocurrence.type === "rrule") { %> <a date="<%= ocurrence.date %>" href="#" class="<%= ocurrence.type %>" title="<%= localization.exclude %>"> <%= localization.exclude %>
<% } %> <% if(ocurrence.type === "rdate") { %> <a date="<%= ocurrence.date %>" href="#" class="<%= ocurrence.type %>" title="<%= localization.remove %>"> <%= localization.remove %>
<% } %> <% if(ocurrence.type === "exdate") { %> <a date="<%= ocurrence.date %>" href="#" class="<%= ocurrence.type %>" title="<%= localization.include %>"> <%= localization.include %>
<% } %>
<% } %>

<% for(var index=0; index < batch.batches.length; index++) { %> <span <% if(index === batch.currentBatch) { %>class="current"<% } %>> <a href="#" start="<%= batch.batches[index][0] %>">[<%= batch.batches[index][0] %> - <%= batch.batches[index][1] %>]
<% } %>
